website_summaries.verdict: Slightly lower price than some other jersey frames that have a similar size.
pros: Uses a clear acrylic door that is secured with a lock and with 2 magnets
Interior dimensions of 23.5 by 31.5 inches, so it'll fit smaller style jerseys better than large styles
Offered at a nice price point
Trusted name in home decor products
cons: Uses brass hooks on the back, so not as sturdy for hanging as brackets

customer_reviews.title: Good buy: Foggy Glass? Remove the film!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to display collectibles that were other than a jersey. It works great! 4 stars instead of 5 because there were a few scratches on the frame when it came. Also, the plastic has a very thin, easy to miss opaque protective covering on both sides of the display causing it to look foggy and cheap quality. Be sure to remove the film! Once removed, the plastic was perfectly clear.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Grace

customer_reviews.title: Hinged latch door and hanger are very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking case to display your collectible jersey. I like the hanger and latch door. Also, included are two solid wall anchors for hanging. Very easy to place your jersey in and mount on your wall. Price is kinda steep for the craftsmanship but not bad. I think a price between $40-$50 is more reasonable. Also, the description mentions a felt lining inside... this is wrong, no lining whatsoever (just noticed so down graded rating from 3 stars). I would return if I didn’t have to ship but not a big deal. Some complained the arcrylic window makes viewing your collectible hard to see... just don’t forget to remove the protective film on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Duf Inouye

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Used this to display an autographed Jersey for a charity auction. The hanger doesn't keep a garment spread through the whole window. I had to tack and tape it. Latch was finicky and cheap. scratches on frame but I filled in with sharpie because I didn't have time to look for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Horn

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I needed this shadow box to display a jersey for an employee who retired after 30 years. There was no hanger inside, there was nothing inside to pin the jersey to and part of the wood was coming apart inside the frame. I had to make it work. There was no time to return it. I was embarrassed because the frame was not what I expected. Never again......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After a few modifications, I can now hang and display my graduation sashes and cords.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: No surprises, the glass (plastic) certainly is not clear but still works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make a birthday gift for my buddy who acted in my film. He dies in the movie, so his costume shirt was covered in blood. Instead of throwing it away, I kept it and put it in the shadow box with some high quality behind the scenes photos of he and I on the film set. He was blown away with it and I was very proud to give it to him. I do wish the plastic display piece was more clear.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s a plastic window and it’s not that clear to see through the plastic. Should be glass!
customer_reviews.author: mariah

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: shipping was not done well, small corner damage...but it served the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: easy

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: I like how the jerseys are on a hanger in this case. It makes it easy to not only put them in but also very convenient to flip over or take out and show it. This is a way better design than the jerseys being held in my pins.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey landwehr

customer_reviews.title: arrived in good condition. Wish it had a cushion back for ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived in good condition. Wish it had a cushion back for pins. It didn't look right hanging the jersey on the hangar provided so we made our own backing to fit the inside back and pinned the jersey to that.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dudz

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described
customer_reviews.text: VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED!! DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!!! THIS ITEM CAME WITH SCRATCHES ALL OVER, IT'S PLASTIC NOT GLASS!!! ALSO IT'S SO BLURRY. NOW I HAVE TO RETURN THIS BACK I WANT MY MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: After I pulled the protecting off the glass this was just perfect for my AF jacket right size and all
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glass
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with the glass detached from the door, was able to fix it, wood inside was broke but not needed. Wouldn’t buy again but is good enough to be able to use for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce K.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR WHAT WE  ARE USING IT FOR
customer_reviews.text: Great product works for the project we wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Witt

customer_reviews.title: Scratched plastic
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews. The plastic window was so scratched that you could barely see what was inside. Very disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for memorabilia
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for us to put memorable items into for my dad's 90 bd . It's large but not too heavy. Can be hung on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Bay

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. It was ready to go now assembly. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with s great price compared to some others.
customer_reviews.author: Scott miller

customer_reviews.title: It has a terrible paint job and looks pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I opened the box it smelled of strong paint...It has a terrible paint job and looks pretty bad. This was supposed to go in a professional space and I embarrassed of what this looked like fresh out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The box was not damaged nor the styrofoam. The pressed wood was completely broken in two places on one entire side. It does not have a glass front. It is an extremely overpriced piece of pressed wood. They have also increased the price since I purchased it. The return window is not long if you decide to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Morneau

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was not as advertised. Zero return information included in package. No receipt. I just spend $85 for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Kupiec

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would have a felt background. It was just painted.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Foggy plastic for glass
customer_reviews.text: This came with scratches on the frame’s paint. It also has plastic for glass that is so foggy that you can’t see what is underneath very well. It looks so bad that I won’t hang in my wall and I’m currently looking for a better replacement.
customer_reviews.author: chey-lo

customer_reviews.title: Acrylic is warped so it doesn't lie flat. I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: Acrylic is warped so it doesn't lie flat. I'm using this as a horizontal display case so dust gets in that way. There were also imperfections in the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sherling

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Reviews: Foggy “glass”
customer_reviews.text: It would have been perfect except... the hardware for hanging was not included and there were scratches on the plexiglass which was foggy.
customer_reviews.author: FavreLover

customer_reviews.title: Window is not glass!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this case however it is misleading. The window is not glass. It is VERY thin plexiglass/plastic. Size and look is great but materials are cheap and not a value for the asking price. I am going to have a piece of actual glass cut to replace the existing plastic which will be easy because it does come off with it being held on by a few screws.
customer_reviews.author: Jnicolem

customer_reviews.title: Good product, remove the inner plastic to clear acrylic
customer_reviews.text: Got what I wanted, had to read the reviews to know about the protective film on the inside of the acrylic. Once I took it off the fogginess is gone and acrylic was crystal clear. My jersey looks great. Giving it 4 stars because instructions do not mention that inner plastic, everything else looks good
customer_reviews.author: James Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for a scratch off map of USA, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of the product. Using it for a pro basketball jersey and signed photo.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blocker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter’s cap and gown. Was so easy to remove out of the box. It was packaged very well. It looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product was packed and wrapped perfectly. But displace case had scratches all over. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The item came quickly and the dram was in good condition. The only setback was the fact the felt that was inside lining the was messed up. This wouldn't matter to someone who was using the frame for its actual purpose (a jersey case). I was using this case as a shadow box and putting pictures and stuff inside.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it didn't fit what I needed it for. So trying to give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

product_meta.title: HOMCOM 24" x 32" Sports Jersey Memorabilia Shadow Box Frame Acrylic Display Case - Black
feature_bullets: ✅MODERN DISPLAY: Provides an attractive way to present your personal collection of signed sports memorabilia from your favorite soccer, basketball, hockey, football, and baseball teams.
✅WOODGRAIN DESIGN: The finished composite wood construction has the look and feel of solid wood at an economy price.
✅DUST PROTECTION: Dust resistant acrylic door protects your item from fading and other harmful effects of the sun while also keeping out unwanted dust.
✅SECURE CLOSURE: The hinged door frame includes two magnets to help keep the door closed and to give your case an extra amount of security.
✅SIMPLE INSTALLATION: It features a hanger on the inside and metal hooks on the back making it ready to display your sports memorabilia right from the get-go.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: HomCom Jersey Frame Display Case Shadow Box - Black
